name: The tale of Yu-Jin
description:
Do you have a pet? how much you like your pet? Can you travel miles to save your pet?
This is not just a game rather a journey of a small girl named Kwan who decides to travel miles to find her pet and bring him back. Play the game to find out what happens with her and her pet Yu-jin but in Metroidvania style.

Cheers! Keep playing.
